edu.mtu.cs3421.voto.VotoComponents

Class Media

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mtu.cs3421.voto.VotoComponents.Media

  • public class Media
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nicholas Schweikart on 3/13/17. A simple container to wrap around the incoming media from a Voto Host.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Media

        Media(byte imgID,
      int totalPackets,
      int imgLength)
        Creats a new Media Object to contain incoming data stream.
        Parameters:
        imgID - the ID for this particular image
        totalPackets - the number of packets this image will take to load
        imgLength - the length of the image in bytes

    • Method Detail

        Returns the status of this image file.
        Returns:
